name: Escape From Midwich Valley
description:
Escape From Midwich Valley is a fast-paced Racing/Shoot ‘Em Up game in a post-apocalyptic/NeonWave world.

You need to leave the planet by reaching The Pillar, your spaceship.
Setting place in the Anarchy Road, the area is populated by violent AIs keeping you from escaping.
Fight your way through them !

Control map is available on pause menu.  Azerty mapping, I suggest changing keyboard layout.

Nicolas "Forthere" - Lead GD, documentation, Game Design

Alexandre "Jukes" - GD, Level Design, Playtest

Mathieu "Xaneos" - Unreal Prog, Level Design, HUD

Joris - Sound Design, Trailer, Playtest 

Valentin - Lead GA, Concept Art, 3D

Arthur - 3D, Concept Art

Clarence - 3D, Concept Art

Louis - 3D, Concept Art

Nathaël - 3D

Romain - 3D, Concept art, Graphic Design
